cvDescription.description: Experienced software engineer with solid understanding of the best development practices, able to quickly investigate, evaluate, and adjust to new challenging contexts, to lead a multicultural team towards effective and mutually beneficial solutions. An avid learner with a focus on details, absorbing advanced technical manuals and mastering the cutting-edge innovations. More than 7 years of experience in three successful companies leading the entire web development lifecycle at more than 10 projects ensuring a high-quality and fulfillment of business and market needs.
